problem: cut.c
char a[1001],*A,*B;main(){for(A=B=gets(gets(a));*A==*++B;);puts(*B?*++B=0,A+puts("YES"):"NO");}
fixed: char a[1001],*A,*B;main(){for(A=B=gets(gets(a));*A==*++B;++A);puts(*B?*++B=0,A+puts("YES"):"NO");}

problem: Cookies.cpp
main(n,ans,x){scanf("%d",&n);ans=0;while(n--){scanf("%d",&x);ans^=x;}puts(ans&1?"First":"Second");};
fixed: main(n,ans,x){scanf("%d",&n);ans=0;while(n--){scanf("%d",&x);ans|=x&1;}puts(ans?"First":"Second");};
